document_data.mainbody: '''Pines''' were a type of hardwood, coniferous [[:Category:Trees|tree]], part of a family of trees known as evergreens.

Varieties.Blueridge: The blueridge pine was a species that could be found in the sandy soil of the [[Rimwood]] on the outskirts of the [[Cormanthor]] forest.
Varieties.Blue Snowwood: The blue snowwood pine was a species endemic to the [[Great Glacier]].
Varieties.Lost Needle: The lost needle pine was a species endemic to the [[Pirate Isles]].
Varieties.Needleleaf: The needleleaf pine was a species that could be found in the sandy soil of the [[Rimwood]] on the outskirts of the [[Cormanthor]] forest.
Varieties.Niflheim: The pines that grew in [[Niflheim]] were, like other trees on that [[plane]], uniquely devoid of color and had a grey tone to them.<ref>
Varieties.Pinyon: The pinyon pine was a species that grew in the [[Pasocada Basin]] area of [[Maztica]], where it was eaten by the [[Azuposi]].
Varieties.Ponderosa: One of the largest pine species, the ponderosa was prominent in part of the [[Savage Frontier]].<ref>
Varieties.Roseneedle: Roseneedle pines grew along the banks of the [[River Ashaba]] and rarely grew more than {{SI|3|ft}} tall. The roots of the tree could extend to over 10' (3m) in depth, with their ends forming tubers that were shaped roughly like potatoes and made for excellent fishing bait. Each needle on the tree had a pink or white rose-like blossom.
Varieties.White: The stately white pine was present in the [[Savage Frontier]].<ref>

Habitats.Beyond Faer√ªn:
* In the [[Hordelands]], pines grew around the shores of the [[Lake of Mists]].
* In [[Kara-Tur]], pines could be found in the [[Hochi Province]] of [[Kozakura]].{{Cite dungeon/17/The Waiting Room of Yen-Wang-Yeh|34}}
* In [[Zakhara]]'s [[Crowded Sea]], pines were prevalent on the higher slopes of the [[Steaming Isles]].
* Groves of pine trees grew around the [[Snowflake Mountains]], particularly on the road between [[Carradoon]] and [[Spirit Soaring]].

document_data.Usage: * Some [[druid]]s in the [[Moonshae Isles]] were known to have groves that were made up of a cluster of pine trees, especially those situated at higher elevations or in the barren northern fringes of the Isles.
